creditline: Bequest from the Karen Daniels Petersen American Indian Collection
description: drum-shaped; light brown; rosy-colored fibrous handle; raised loop and braid designs
image_copyright: Copyright of the artist%2C artist%27s estate%2C or assignees
text: Anishinaabe artist Josie Robinson created this basket to store sewing materials. The basket is constructed from splinted ash, sweetgrass, and the inner bark of basswood woven together. Anishinaabe basketry has always been innovative, either through form and style or with material.
title: Sewing Basket
